title: We Happy Few E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Tim and Colin breakdown the We Happy Few E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys this is Colin Mor arti you are watching us here on kind of funny games as we cover E3 2016 right now we're taking a look at we happy few a game that got a surprising amount of time at the Microsoft press conference all things considered but I think it looks really interesting and was one of my favorite moments of the entire press confence yeah I agree uh the game uh looks awesome this was a kickstarted game um that seems like ID at Xbox might be infusing a little bit of money to to get it first um it's got significant BioShock Vibes significant Ken LaVine influences I think can be seen here um it's a really interesting idea as people see um moving forward it seems like you're in a heavily medicated Society um you're kind of like trying to break free the entire story uh at least from the outside reminds me a little bit of like a I got like a Rod Sterling Twilight Zone kind of vibe from this which you get from Bioshock as well so it seems I mean look at it I

story uh at least from the outside reminds me a little bit of like a I got like a Rod Sterling Twilight Zone kind of vibe from this which you get from Bioshock as well so it seems I mean look at it I mean even aesthetically even the way the camera moves it's Bioshock and it's kind of I'm a Hu I mean how many times I have to say I'm a huge Bioshock it's one of my favorite games of all time Bioshock so um anything that takes a page out of that book and we'll do it successfully and it seems like they're going to do it successfully the thing is I I keep I keep saying this looks like a really like smaller scale Bioshock which is interesting to me because like I like that I like the smaller experiences and I think that like watching this the this gameplay makes me feel emotion and that's good you know that's obviously the goal with these type of games and I think that the end of this this trailer with the pinata like as you can see over here here it's creepy as all [ __ ] yeah it is super

you know that's obviously the goal with these type of games and I think that the end of this this trailer with the pinata like as you can see over here here it's creepy as all [ __ ] yeah it is super creepy and again it's really unnerving yeah it reminds me of the um the golf club scene a little bit in in the original Bioshock to a degree not really just in kind of that it's like a little jarring um but uh yeah I think that uh this is a game that wasn't really on my radar actually at all I knew that it existed i' had seen things on it Greg had actually played it I think at Pax um and was raving about it these guys had successfully funded their game um when I see a game like this um compulsion games doing their thing kind of independently it makes me wonder if they were interested in staying outside of the publisher ecosystem for the most part in kind of retaining their own identity and their own independence because this is a game to me that I would have been surprised that other team

outside of the publisher ecosystem for the most part in kind of retaining their own identity and their own independence because this is a game to me that I would have been surprised that other team or other Publishers wouldn't have wanted to fund in other words like this seems like a game that a first party would have tried to pick up um and they have in their own kind of way but I had said on our uh on our stream that it looks like it's an Xbox One console exclusive but that's apparently not the case it's coming first Xbox one but when I was researching they have not yet announced it for PS4 it is coming to PC and Linux I think as well but I hope it comes PS4 yeah me too but if it doesn't I mean this is one of those games where you kind of plug in the Xbox One and play it we have you know 10 PS4s in the house and one Xbox One um and we're very open and honest about that but the games come along and you have to play them and you know um I think this is really one of those cool looking

10 PS4s in the house and one Xbox One um and we're very open and honest about that but the games come along and you have to play them and you know um I think this is really one of those cool looking games and I know people are super excited about below and inside which are Ide at Xbox games which I think are really fascinating and great looking games as well this is way cooler looking to me than those so um this is definitely on my high on my list in the Indie realm on Xbox one yeah definitely as as the the trailer was going on or the the gameplay video whatever um it started off and I was like all right cool it's a bios shock like ripoff and then as it went on I'm like oh this is actually really cool this is something really unique and I like the the the world seems really really cool and the kind of mind-based things I was like H I don't really like this but then by the end of it like the the drugs being happy and like the joy I think they were calling it it's awesome very cool I

and the kind of mind-based things I was like H I don't really like this but then by the end of it like the the drugs being happy and like the joy I think they were calling it it's awesome very cool I dig it as well I mean I don't think it's it is a Bioshock ripoff but I like I don't necessarily think it's a bad thing yeah I don't think it's a bad thing either I mean we can't know that without having played it but I mean just looking at the way they're telling the story looking at the way you're moving through the environment I mean it is BioShock and there's nothing wrong with taking influence from great games like that better to take influence from a game like Bioshock than another game that it sucks so you know more power to him I'm super excited to see what compulsion comes up with ladies and gentlemen stay right here on youtube.com/ kindf footing games for all of your e326 videos reactions Let's Plays podcasts all that stuff we'll be right there
